common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get overall performance data for all post Shopee Video. There is at least a one-day delay.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Period Type. Applicable values:

Day
Week
Month

Last7d

Last15d

Last30d


Note: The end date must align with the Period Type.

","name":"period_type","sample":"Month","type":"string","required":"True","key":"yQGNjwp"},{"description":"

The end_date format should be \"YYYY-MM-DD\".

- For Day, Last7d, Last15d, and Last30d, the end_date must before current day.

- For Week, the end_date must be Sunday and must be less than or equal to the current week.

- For Month, the end_date must be the end of the month and must be less than or equal to the current month.

","name":"end_date","sample":"2025-09-30","type":"string","required":"True","key":"rYYQBGD"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"zkiHcpP"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BpWawHe"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"2af852cd-7420-4714-b7cd-33317f6fe548","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zYDGrdG"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"tymQyW","children":[{"description":"","name":"key_metric","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"wKdpard","children":[{"description":"

The placed value of orders from all videos in the period selected.

","name":"placed_sales","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"nZhTWJJ"},{"description":"

The confirmed value of orders from all videos in the period selected.

","name":"confirmed_sales","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"aPGJXti"},{"description":"

The number of placed orders from all videos in the period selected. 

","name":"placed_orders","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WQSDNhm"},{"description":"

The number of confirmed orders from all videos in the period selected.

","name":"confirmed_orders","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FBrRfmK"},{"description":"

Number of item sold from placed orders in the video.

","name":"placed_item_sold","sample":"3","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"JHWfhWN"},{"description":"

Number of item sold from confirmed orders in the video.

","name":"confirmed_item_sold","sample":"3","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WZCGDYZ"},{"description":"

Number of viewers of the video.

","name":"total_viewers","sample":"4","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"SmeKNPf"},{"description":"

Number of views for the video that lasted for more than 3 seconds.

","name":"effective_views","sample":"4","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"rNkFKEG"},{"description":"

Total watch duration per video.

","name":"avg_view_duration","sample":"5","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ZGaRQxt"}]},{"description":"","name":"conversion","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"twmtSGz","children":[{"description":"

Number of unique buyers who placed order from the video.

","name":"placed_buyers","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"DwWHWXp"},{"description":"

Number of unique buyers who confirmed order from the video.

","name":"confirmed_buyers","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TYezmdT"},{"description":"

Number of \"Add To Cart\" button clicked for all products in the orange bag during video viewing.

","name":"total_atc","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"CbRxdJZ"},{"description":"

Number of products clicks divided by Number of video views.

","name":"ctr","sample":"3.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WxBRBcA"},{"description":"

Number of placed product orders from the video divided by Number of product clicks from the video.

","name":"placed_co_rate","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hiTPsMG"},{"description":"

Number of confirmed product orders from the video divided by Number of product clicks from the video.

","name":"confirmed_co_rate","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"XxsfMhf"},{"description":"

Total placed sales divided by Total placed orders.

","name":"placed_abs","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"kbGwRyE"},{"description":"

Total confirmed sales divided by Total confirmed orders.

","name":"confirmed_abs","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"cRGwHn"},{"description":"

The placed Sales generated for every 1,000 views.

","name":"placed_gpm","sample":"3.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"YEmkHSy"},{"description":"

The confirmed Sales generated for every 1,000 views.

","name":"confirmed_gpm","sample":"4.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"iFFyQiK"},{"description":"

Videos with at least one product in the orange bag.

","name":"video_with_products","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"yfYhreP"},{"description":"

Videos that generates placed revenues.

","name":"placed_revenue_generating_videos","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"brnRCSc"},{"description":"

Videos that generates confirmed revenues.

","name":"confirmed_revenue_generating_videos","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"mQdSCsZ"}]},{"description":"","name":"engagement","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"GzicTHr","children":[{"description":"

Number of views from all videos

","name":"total_views","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"EXbQRRD"},{"description":"

Number of likes from all videos

","name":"total_likes","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WJnrbRj"},{"description":"

Number of shares from all videos

","name":"total_shares","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tbDnGKz"},{"description":"

Number of comments from all videos

","name":"total_comments","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"jeSWFiP"},{"description":"

Number of new followers from all videos

","name":"video_new_followers","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ePeeaFK"}]},{"description":"

Data offline computation time.

","name":"fetched_date_range","sample":"2025-02-28","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jxSiwRQ"}]}]}
